public static void writePlaylist(DirectoryManager directoryManager,
                                 IDbDataPortal dbDataPortal,
                                 IReadOnlyPlaylist playlist,
                                 java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String playerModelName)
Writes a Playlist to a file with the given name

Parameters:
directoryManager - The directory manager which will be used
dbDataPortal - The database data portal which will be used
playlist - The IReadOnlyPlaylist to be saved
name - The name (String) of the IReadOnlyPlaylist file to be saved
playerModelName - The name (String) of the current AbstractPlayerModelManager

writePlaylistToFile

public static void writePlaylistToFile(IDbDataPortal dbDataPortal,
                                       IReadOnlyPlaylist playlist,
                                       java.io.File playlistDirectory,
                                       java.lang.String name)
Writes a Playlist to a file with the given name in a given directory

Parameters:
dbDataPortal - The database data portal which will be used
playlist - The IReadOnlyPlaylist to be saved
playlistDirectory - The directory (File) to which the playlist File will be saved.
name - The name (String) of the IReadOnlyPlaylist file to be saved
